title: Instructional Design Process for Enhancing Mobile Library User Experience

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Optimizing library services to support language-related research activities in mobile learning environments.

learning_goals: Students can explain three criteria for evaluating the system quality (stability, speed) of a mobile library app.
Learners can apply five interface design principles for improving user experience to real-world cases.
Participants can propose and incorporate feedback into at least two strategies for utilizing library content based on mobile learning scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
